website_summaries.verdict: Tarte lovers who don't need a full-coverage concealer will appreciate this product's light coverage that is easy to blend and feels nice on the skin.
pros: A lightweight concealer that offers light to medium coverage, making it a good choice for no-makeup makeup days
Contains algae that adds a soft glow
cons: Some users with fair skin report the concealer oxidizing after several hours of wear

customer_reviews.title: Loving this concealer
customer_reviews.text: So far this is my favorite concealer the past month. It is very light, I have not felt cakey while using it. It blends in really well and doesn't settle in the fine lines around my eyes. Stays on very well throughout the day. I am crazy in love with the big brush it comes with - its a lot more fluid than shape tape -- very silky going on and it stays!!
customer_reviews.author: K. K. Schiller

customer_reviews.title: This is the one
customer_reviews.text: I am 54 and tried ALLOT of concealer for under my eyes, and this one wins hands down every time. Light weight coverage and blendable with a damp makeup sponge does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Love Tarte products
customer_reviews.text: This concealer is perfect for people with dry skin. Bought mine from Tarte on Amazon. I really like Tarte products. If Tarte products on Amazon is not sold by Tarte then I go on their website to buy, where I know that the product is genuine and cheaper. Do your homework before you buy.
customer_reviews.author: Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect concealer
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. I absolutely love the coverage and the moisture that it provides. It keeps my makeup looking smooth and doesn’t look dry.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda W.

customer_reviews.title: A keeper!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It brushes out beautifully. I would caution that a little goes a long way! I use it for under eye concealer only. It’s definitely a keeper for my makeup bag!
customer_reviews.author: Deblyn

customer_reviews.title: Love tarte
customer_reviews.text: I pair this with my shape tape double duty Concelar...love taste products. The only thing I don't like is the bottle didn't come sealed.
customer_reviews.author: BriWadd

customer_reviews.title: Not his for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as I read it was good for skin prone to breakouts. It totally broke my skin out. The bottle is pretty small too, and comes with a swab applicator.
customer_reviews.author: diana

customer_reviews.title: Smells weird
customer_reviews.text: Works okay but smells very strange so if you are sensitive to smells i would not purchase this item
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this product! I am always searching for a great concealer and I have found “the one” The collection of other concealers I have accumulated will be pitched out after using this wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmie K

customer_reviews.title: Best concealer I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: This is the best concealer I've ever used. Brightens your face, leaves it soft & smooth and lasts throughout the day. What more could you ask for?!
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: It’s alright
customer_reviews.text: Not too bad. It’s very thin and not the greatest for a concealer
customer_reviews.author: Luckie13

customer_reviews.title: Not overly pleased
customer_reviews.text: Made my skin look and feel very dry and scaly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage
customer_reviews.text: Light but complete coverage, stayed on several hours. I would order a darker shade for myself next time, but I liked the product.
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: My favorite...... when I get a full bottle
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. Light and Smooth. Covers well! EDIT: I opened the new bottle I ordered and wow what a small bottle and HALF WAS SPILLED OUT see attached picture. Don’t need much to cover so I had not opened my new bottle til now. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Good, smooth, coverage.
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it went on smoothly, it covers well, and blends easily. My one complaint is the chemical smell.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Woods

product_meta.title: Rainforest of the Sea aquacealer concealer- fair light
